vision.title: VISION
vision.content:
We are moving toward becoming the world’s largest independent third-party advertising platform,

supporting 1,000 brands and 100,000 companies along the way,

while building the premier global intelligence platform.

yeahmobi.title: Yeahmobi
yeahmobi.desc: Powered by advanced ad technology and data analysis, we orchestrate premium Performance Network resources—DSP, Affiliate Networks—to provide end-to-end solutions that drive high-quality user acquisition and maximize advertising revenue for every client.

oversea.title: Overseas Advertising Business
oversea.desc: From mobile games and apps to cross-border e-commerce, we deliver a one-stop services that integrates creative strategy, market research, data analysis, media planning and implementation—empowering clients to expand their business overseas by providing comprehensive marketing solutions.

zMaticoo.title: zMaticoo
zMaticoo.desc: zMaticoo, a programmatic advertising platform, utilizes advanced algorithms and AI to deliver real-time, omnichannel data-driven marketing.Powered by full-stack analytics, it drives superior performance, user acquisition, and ROI for global advertisers and app developers.

fields.name: Company Name
fields.addrVal: 12th Floor, Tower Building,5-8-1 Jingumae, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo

footer.rights: Copyright © CLICK TECH Co., Ltd All Rights Reserved.

blocks.middleText: We offer Instagram-led branding counsel that extends to Twitter, Facebook, and all major social platforms.
blocks.rightText: We support the establishment of social media branding strategies, the creation of audience-matched photos and videos, and the operation of accounts. By continuously monitoring follower growth, engagement, and profile/URL traffic,we implement improvement measures such as effectiveness verification and advertising optimization.

categories.title: Service Categories
categories.desc: We provide diversified marketing services tailored to customer and product needs, solve business challenges throughout the sales process, and create new growth opportunities.

strategy.title: Strategic Planning
strategy.text: We deliver customer-centric, multi-dimensional product analysis, marketing strategy, and program planning that amplify every product launch.

creative.title: Creative Design
creative.text: We provide a one-stop service that turns localized creative concepts into ready-to-use assets and keeps optimizing them for peak performance.

media.title: Media Operations
media.text: We secure premium inventory in your target markets, forge long-term partnerships with top-tier media, and deliver rapid onboarding and efficient management to maximize ROI.

insights.title: Industry Insights
insights.text: We combine deep-dive market research with real-time data to map target-industry landscapes and accurately identify product competitiveness.

coreMarket.title: Core Markets
coreMarket.desc: We are rooted in Asia-Pacific, propelling brands to global prominence.

coreCases.title: Core Markets
coreCases.desc: We are APAC-focused, powering brands’ global expansion.

case1.title: 奇跡の暖かさ
case1.desc: CPIとCPCは、オフラインでの屋外およびテレビコマーシャルプロモーションと組み合わされ、2017年に日本で人気のある女性旅行者になりました。

case2.title: 放置少女〜百花繚乱の萌姫たち〜
case2.desc: 予約から製品への売れ行きの良いリストTop10に入るために、全体的なサポート、最適化のアドバイス、広告業務、材料生産およびサポートの他の……

case3.title: Huel
case3.desc: SEO＆KOLは、オフラインの活動と世代別の操作を組み合わせて、Huelの迅速な認知度の向上と中国でのブランドの構築を支援します。

case4.title: Cotti Coffee
case4.desc: ブランド運営を通じてブランドとユーザーの最初のつながりを行い、セレブマーケティング、PRコミュニケーション、ソーシャルメディアプラットフォーム……

award20240112.title: On January 12, 2024, the TBI Top Brand Innovation Awards ceremony concluded successfully in Shanghai. Click Tech’s overseas marketing campaign for Cotti Coffee was honored with the Silver Prize in the Overseas Marketing category.
award20240112.excerpt: クリックテックは、cotti coffee の海外ブランドマーケティングサービス事例で海外マーケティンググループ銀賞を受賞しました...
award20240112.body: クリックテックは、cotti coffee の海外ブランドマーケティングサービス事例で海外マーケティンググループ銀賞を受賞しました。（本文フルテキストはここに追加してください）
